alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 10:27PM MST until January 04 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches, except between 5 and 9 inches across the Chuska Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Far Northwest Highlands, Northwest Highlands, Chuska Mountains, Northwest Plateau, Southwest Mountains, and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-40. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains; Far Northwest Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Northwest Plateau; Southwest Mountains; West Central Highlands
